name: Alchemist's Supplies

name: Angler's Tools
description: A wooden rod, silken line, corkwood bobbers, steel hooks, lead sinkers, velvet lures, and narrow netting.

name: Blacksmith's Tools
description: Hammers, tongs, charcoal, rags, and a whetstone

name: Brewer's Supplies
description: A glass jug, hops, a siphon, and some tubing

name: Calligrapher's Supplies
description: Ink, 12 sheets of parchment, and three quills

name: Carpenter's Tools
description: A saw, a hammer, nails, a hatchet, a square, a ruler, an adze, a plane, a spokeshave, and a chisel

name: Cartographer's Tools
description: A quill, ink, parchment, a pair of compasses, calipers, and a ruler

name: Chandler's Tools
description: Storage containers, wicks, molds, essential oils, and a small cauldron

name: Cobbler's Tools
description: A hammer, an awl, a knife, a shoe stand, a cutter, spare leather, and thread

name: Cook's Utensils

name: Disguise Kit

name: Mason's Tools

name: Navigator's Tools

name: Painter's Supplies

name: Tailor's Tools
description: Thread, needles, measuring tapes, shears, chalk, a hole punch, and a thimble.

name: Thieves' Tools

name: Tinker's Tools
description: A variety of hand tools, nails, screws, thread, needles, a whestone, scraps of cloth, leather, and metal, and a small pot of glue

name: Weaver's Tools
